actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to repeal the denial of the use of the accelerated cost recovery system with respect to tax-exempt obligations, and the expiration of the authority to issue such obligations.

summary.text: Amends the Tax Equity and Fiscal Responsibility Act of 1982 to repeal provisions which disallow the accelerated cost recovery deductions for property financed with tax-exempt industrial development bonds. Repeals the 1986 expiration date for the authority to issue such tax-exempt obligations.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the denial of the use of the accelerated cost recovery system with respect to tax-exempt obligations, and the expiration of the authority to issue such obligations.
